text:
I am longing for the day I return to this wonderful villa. It was five days of absolute bliss. I’ve stayed in a few pool villas in Bali and although all were lovely in their own way, One Eleven (for me anyway) was the crème de la crème. I was drawn to its sleek, contemporary design that’s different to the usual villas on offer in Bali.  It’s very cool, hip and conveniently located to many great restaurants and shops. 

All villas are identical and are extremely spacious with a great outdoor space offering a beautifully manicured lawn where you can chase the sun. There’s a separate spa gazebo which we didn’t make use of. I personally would have preferred to have had a nice outdoor bale / daybed there instead. The sun lounges, although looked very funky, weren’t the most comfortable to use. 

The pool is a great size, much larger than other villas we’ve stayed in and the depth is pretty decent too. Water temperature was perfect every day, not too cold.  Bed was comfortable, nice shower, huge bath and plenty of bathroom amenities. They have insect repellent in cute little bottles that you can throw into your purse or pocket. Make sure to ask for extra of these, they proved to be very handy when out and about.  We also had sweets waiting for us after dinner and a little gift beside the bed, very thoughtful and something we actually looked forward to each night.

Breakfast is cooked in your villa and was always delicious. The chefs were all lovely and cleaned up after themselves immediately, leaving you to enjoy your meal. My only issue with breakfast is that each day you had to select from a menu with limited choices. There’s an Indonesian, Western and sweet option.  I’m a creature of habit when it comes to my breakfast and usually like to eat the same thing and thought it was a little odd I couldn’t order my eggs cooked the way I wanted.  Hopefully they’ll change this next time I come back. 

This was by far the most relaxing trip to Bali we’ve had and credit definitely goes to the amazing staff who were all so accommodating and assisted us with every single request. Each morning our lovely butler would ask us what our plans were for the day. He made all our restaurant bookings (always got a good table) and made sure a car was ready to take us to our destination (within Seminyak only). Vehicles were all modern and clean with the air-con running so it was nice and cool when you got in. Make sure you grab their business cards to give to restaurant staff etc who can call the villa and arrange for a car to pick you up. It was so luxurious to have this service and certainly took a lot of the stress out of making these arrangements yourself. There was always a car available. Everything was just so easy. They also arranged a car to take us to Bintang Supermarket where the driver waited for us while we stocked up on essentials. 

Airport pick-up and drop off is included in the price, both times very smooth, quick and hassle-free. When you arrive to the villas and need cash, ask your butler as they’ll drive you to a reliable, honest bank nearby with good exchange rates. Like I said earlier, everything about One Eleven was just so easy.  All you need to do is relax. Can’t wait to come back.
title: ABSOLUTE BLISS!!

text:
My friend and I booked accommodation on internet for nine nigths at One Eleven in July 8 - 17, 2014. We compared many accommodation options before we made decision and reservation and read the comments about them and finally we chose One Eleven because so many visitors has positive comments about it on internet and especially on TripAdvisor.

The service at One Eleven was excellent and we really loved the breakfast made privately for us every morning in the kitchen of our villa.  Every evening  the breakfast and juice options were introduced to us by our butler and we made our selection for the next morning. We had three breakfast options to be selected and one of option was always Indonesian breakfast and the other ones were international breakfasts. The selection changed daily, so you have many options to be selected during your stay. The breakfast was always fresh and very lush (main dish, bread, coffee, yoghurt, juice, marmalades, milk, cereal, fresh fruits, etc.), so we had no need for lunch at all!  I had my 50-year birthday during our stay and on my birthday morning breakfast team suprised me with the song and cake, that was really nice gesture and made my day!

Every day we had complimentary water, fresh fruits and some small cakes and sorbets for resfresments. As real coffee lovers (we are Finnish :)) we really appreciated complimentary Nespresso coffee maker and the selection of espressos and black coffees. In-room Wifi worked well.

During our stay at One Eleven we had complimentary private car and driver to be used in Semiyak region. That was very handy and safe at those evenings when we had a dinner in restaurant outside the hotel neigbourhood and we did not like to walk in the dark evening along the narrow streets. One evening we had a dinner at Shiro Sushi restaurants situated at One Eleven, we can really recommend this restaurant for all sushi lovers.  All ingredients were fresh and sushis were perfectly  prepared and the interior of the restaurant is very stylish and as Scandinavians we loved the clean forms and lines of architecture. Even the prices at Shiro are quite high compared to standard Indonesian price level, the food was the worth of the price.

The personnel of the One Eleven was amazing and very helpful, they made all reservations for the dinners and trips to the countryside. If we had any question or needed transportation we just called ”0 ” with our telephone for butler service and they always dId their best to serve us. We even use ”in room dinner” service at this hotel, because it was not pricey and the food was delicious. 

We really enjoyed our stay at One Eleven in apartment number six:  the privacy, the helpful and very friendly staff, the great pool villa with the garden, the pool is large enough to swim, villa is spacious, clean and modern, all equipments and furnitures are very high standard (only the sun deck by the pool in apartment six needs to be fixed, some of the wooden boards were broken). During our stay the surroudings were very peaceful and there were no noisy neigbours, so we had perfect holiday at One Eleven.  One Eleven is definetely worth of five stars or even more!  If one negative comment must be given, it was this: the hotel was so great that you just want to stay there and not want to go outside!  Terima kasih (many thanks)  to the staff and our butler Udin, we will definetely be back to this hotel when we next time visit Bali. Hope it will be soon!

Pak Mika and Pak Tapio
title: Worth of five stars or even more!

While reportedly a couples only hotel there were clearly three people (or more?)  checked in and partying in Villa 6. Highlights: enormous villas; great pools; staff are enormously attentive; sensational drivers and local transfers. Lowlights: average in villa spa treatments and massages; major constructions happening directly across the road; no DVDs/movies available; sound travels extremely well across villas which is problematic when you land inconsiderate neighbours.

owner_response.text:
Many thanks for your review of your stay at One Eleven, which is sincerely appreciated.

We are very disappointed that your expectations were not met as it is our intention at One Eleven to exceed the expectations of each and every guest staying at One Eleven and for this reason, we thank you for providing this feedback.

Thank you for recognizing the attentiveness of our staff, sensational drivers and local transfers but most importantly for raising those other points of your experience during your stay with us. 

First and foremost, I would like to apologise for any noise that was of disturbance. I have also noted on your comments that more than two guests had checked in to a villa. As it is our policy that not more than two people are allowed to check-into one villa, we have seriously looked into this matter. Upon review, we believe the guests in question had some friends over to their villa for drinks, but they were not staying with us, however this does not take away the importance of your comments, as any inconvenience to our guests should be avoided.

At One Eleven, generally our guests are like yourselves, they are here for a time of quiet and peaceful relaxation whilst also being able to pop out to enjoy the highlights of Seminyak and Bali should they wish.  This is our own philosophy and what we wish to offer our guests and thus I have taken extra steps and will do our utmost to ensure that our guests enjoy their time with us. 

With regards to the construction across the road,  we are assured that the work should be completed in the near future and are in regular contact with the contractor and owners of the project to minimize any inconvenience to our guests.

It is our wish to continuously look at ways to enhance further the One Eleven experience and after your receiving your review, we are now in the process of arranging a collection of DVD movies for the future use of our guests. I have also addressed your comments with our Spa Manager with regards to the spa treatments.

I do sincerely thank you for your review as we take each review very seriously. It is my promise to our guests that we will continue to take every measure to ensure that a stay at One Eleven is as it should be. 

In spite of the aforementioned, I do hope that overall you enjoyed your stay at One Eleven and Bali.

With very best regards

David

text:
My partner and I have just returned from 10 nights in Bali, all of which were spent at this perfectly located premium group of 9 modern villas. We were in villa 9, other people have said the walk is a little too far, we thought this ridiculous and enjoyed the privacy at the end, there is always the golf cart if the small walk proves too difficult. We had no issues with anything not working whilst we were there, the pictures are what you receive. Breakfast each day on call at our convenience was sensational, the large choices allowed us to have a different meal each day we were there. The selection of mini bar treats is extensive, as are the choices of toiletries in the bathroom. An abundance of towels, pillows and robes make the stay very comfortable.
Nothing was too much trouble, from booking a private car for the day to making a dinner reservation which always resulted in an excellent table upon arrival. The resorts vehicle was always available for local trips and we were offered pick up service from the many dinners we indulged in. The Japanese restaurant that is part of the complex was absolutely amazing, we eat a lot of Japanese food and this experience rates as probably the best ever. 
The beautiful staff were very well presented, friendly and professional, our room was kept immaculate with no fear of lack of privacy or dishonesty. In fact the washing was returned with a receipt and some money worth about AU$10 and a note saying that it had been found. Whilst you can lock your bedroom within your villa we never did and never felt the need to.
We were asked to find something to point out that could be done better and we cannot. We are professionals who live in a somewhat luxurious house back in Australia, we could be described as difficult to please although I would say we have high expectations. We were completely impressed with the entire experience and cannot wait to return again soon. 
Thank you for making our holiday.

text:
If you are the type who likes massive resorts with hordes of people, the W would be the place for you. However, if you like privacy, service, and style, look no further. 
We chose 111 for its size (only 9 villas), location (you are steps away from some of the best shops and restaurants in Seminyak), and for the villa design (the outdoor living room and high ceilings as well as the slick lines and minimalism appealed to us). What we didn't expect was the amazing service. The butler came with the driver to pick us up from our hotel in Ubud (he really didn't have to do that), and even though we changed our mind 5 tines about pick-up time, they accommodated us with perfect efficiency. Whenever we asked for the shuttle it was always available, and before we even arrived, they reached out to ask if they could make us any reservations or arrangements (which was perfect because many restaurants in Seminyak don't take email reservations). When we arrived they gave us all the reservation info and even called us one night to say "it's getting late, we think you are running late to dinner, would u like a lift?"
When I told the butler I love mangosteen, he had some delivered and kept our fridge stocked with it. On the morning of our departure they offered take us breakfast in the villa as usual, even though it would have been at 4:00am. We felt bad and declined, so they made us breakfast to go. 
The villa was stunning and very clean. The choice of toiletries was grand, and the pool impeccable. Yes, we also had the ac/hot water issue..ac in the bedroom had to be kept at 16c in order to get hot water from the shower. However, it didn't turn out to be such a big deal, since it was so hot outside that the AC was a welcome. And after we showered we just turned the temperature up. 
All the technology was otherwise great, and ability to open the gate to the villa from the living room without having to run to the door was a nice touch. We were left little dessert surprises in the fridge each night, and the speaker was awesome..volume is loud enough for a party! We stayed by the pool one day and had a great time.
The staff also suggested a great driver to take us to Uluwatu and Jimbaran. He was cheap, nice, and took us to see places that were not on our list but we were enchanted with (blue point beach, etc).
We went to the W one night for a drink, and were ecstatic that we didn't stay there. Although beautiful, it is massive and you could be anywhere in the world and you wouldn't know it. Also, hoards of loud Russians (even though I am one) did not impress me one bit, and neither did the impersonal staff who shoved us in a cab were the driver charged us 150,000 rupiah to take us down the street to 111 ( what should have been a 25,000 ride). 
Overall, nothing from what we've seen in Seminyak beats 111, and their staff are made of gold. Worth every penny and we can't wait to return.

But truly One Eleven is all about the service. My fiancé can be extremely picky and all his requests were answered promptly and efficiently with a smile. And to give you an idea of what kind of truly personal service you get at 111: each day they will bring cakes before turn down service. On the first day they served some balinese pudding cake and I told the butler that my favorite cake/sweets were Putu ( a typical javanese street food sweet). The next day, they brought putu to our villa! How amazing is that? They're really not easy to find in Bali! 
I really would like to thank everyone at 111 for their truly personal service. If there was 6 star rating for service on tripadvisor, that's what I would give 111!

text:
All the positive reviews are correct, this is a great villa and the service is perfect. It’s better than any of the photos and some the best service we have ever had in Bali. 

So let me provide some tips on staying here.

The Villas are off the main road. About 7 min walk. You will end up right next to Ultimo restaurant, and all the rest of the cafe strip, so perfect spot for eating.

The beach is a long walk, probably 20 min, but the car service is great. Can get busy during check-in/checkout times around 12-2pm

You can take one of the side roads instead of heading to the main road and you will end up at Grocer n Grind after about an 8 min walk.

The road out front is not sealed, so a bit rough, but nothing to worry about. Workers are keeping it wet and smooth regularly.

There are 9 Villas, so No 1 is right near the reception and 9 is right at the end. They have golf buggies if you find walking from 9 to reception too hard. I personally probably would not pick Villa 1 as it seems a bit too close to the reception, so might be noisy, but not sure.

If I had to find some faults, then I would consider these to be minor and nit-picking.
The light switch for the bedroom lights it too far to reach while in bed, so unless you really stretch, you have to get out of bed to turn off the lights.

I hear that some guests complain about the massage room gets too hot during the day. While we stayed there, the temp was cool, so our massage was perfect. We kept the doors open to let the breeze in. However, I can see that when it’s hot, the room is poorly designed to keep cool. It’s got a glass roof!! I understand that they are looking to fix this issue.

I see some comments about the internet, but we found it not too bad. Don’t expect to watch HD YouTube, but ok for surfing. Skype was not too bad either. It was occasionally flaky, but a quick call to reception and they reset the router and all good.

Overall, this is a very nice villa complex with great service in a great location
title: Very nice villa complex with great service in a great location

text:
We stayed at 1 11 as the first stop on our honeymoon in Bali in August. We got picked up at the airport by our butler after a very long and stressful journey from the uk and were instantly switched into holiday relaxation mode as we were escorted into the car and given drinks and cold flannels! From that point on the level of service we received at the resort was exceptional.

The villas themselves are stunning as you'll see from the photos (they look exactly like the brochure for a change!) and the location is good, a couple of minutes walk from the main stretch through seminyak with restaurants and shops but far enough away to escape the noise of the traffic and people. The resort is a real oasis of calm. It's a bit of a walk from the beach but you can get dropped off, seminyak beach isn't great though so we mostly hung around our villa for 3 days!

We had massages in our villa which were very good. Probably much much more expensive than if you were to have them outside the resort but it's a nice treat to have the treatment in your villa and go back to sunbathing afterwards!

We also ate in the Japanese restaurant attached to the hotel which served good sushimi and fresh sushi.

As with everywhere we've stayed in Bali the staff are wonderfully friendly and bend over backwards to accommodate you. We felt a bit embarrassed at first ringing them up every time we wanted anything and having the butlers rushing down to your villa but once you get used to being waited on its a great experience!

Would definitely recommend this place to couples visiting seminyak.
title: Perfect Start to our honeymoon in Bali

text:
I'll try not to forget too much here...

SERVICE- The staff are exceptionally well trained. They know your name/wifes name and you genuinely feel they want your stay to be perfect. Our butler had previously worked on luxury yachts in Europe and knew exactly what he was doing. Any small issues the staff deal with quickly and efficiently. Great feeling of being welcome. The management have clearly been careful with recruiting and it makes a huge difference to your stay. 

TRANSPORT- car is available to take you to nearby locations. Makes a huge difference again. Drivers are polite, well groomed, friendly and know where they are going.If you have stayed at other villas in Bali you will know this is not always the case

F&B- food is excellent. A few times we ordered cocktails and got some nice tapas to go with it. Fridge is well stocked with quality items not just rubbish from 7/11. Fridge is cold enough! (Rare)

ROOMS- very spacious and clean. Bathroom excellent with amazing ameneties like unique shower gels, sun cream, aloe, body creams. Great shower.

OUTDOOR- very spacious and practical, living area great for hanging out reading the news, chilling out. Amazing private massage rooms and great massage service. Pool is beautiful and clean
  
LOCATION- short walk to Jl Oberoi and many shops/resto's nearby. One of the reasons we didn't try the Japanese resto on sight!

These villas have got it right. This is up there with the Club Villas at the Legian in my opinion as the best in Bali. If its within you're budget I doubt you will be disappointed. I would now hesitate to stay anywhere else because this place guarantees satisfaction, you just can't go wrong here. Thanks to the great staff and management.
title: A class above. One of the best 5 star villas in Bali without doubt! If it's within your budget-book it.

text:
One Eleven in Semyniak

A topper!

We stayed here 5 days and this was the last hotel of our 3 week trip through Indonesia. We could not imagine a better end.
It is a recent design hotel that consists of nine spacious villas with private pool and it is even better than the pictures on the website. 

The living room has all amenities you require, the fridge is maxi size and has way too much candy, sweets, icecream and other goodies (there goes the weight).

Bedroom is really spacious and the bed is really good, perfect nightsleep.

Bathroom, much better than in the picture, all kind of soaps & more, lot's of towels etc... bath & shower.

Really everything you could wish for was present: luxury, tranquility, top service, nice breakfast that they personally prepare every morning for you and a massage in your own pavilion. The staff was incredibly friendly, warm and helpful. Our compliments to Yenky our personal buttler for his excellent service!

A welcome drink and a foot scrub with massage on arrival and free transportation we found a very nice touch.

The only minor thing to this has nothing to do with One Eleven, it's the location, it's not bad but this place on some sandy white beach with blue water (Gili Meno? Lombok?) and we would never leave it!

Our thanks to everyone to provide us with a memorable stay. Leaving this place hurts.

Kristoff & Jasja
title: A topper!

text:
1) The Villa

Everything looks exactly the same as it appears in the photos! Not like most photos out there which are heavily photo-shopped. Style is a very personal thing. If you are a modern minimalist, this is definitely the place for you. I chose this because this suits my boyfriend and my style completely and it definitely met our expectation. 
- Cool pool with a good depth
- Large bathtub that can fit two
- Clean and well maintained. But be prepared to face some mosquitoes and lizards, which are inevitable in tropics. 
- As the environment is really tranquil, you might feel awkward if you get too loud. 

2) The Service

I cannot emphasize how amazed we were by all the service staff. 
- Even before I confirmed my reservation via email, the reservation staff has been extremely helpful with all my questions and requests! Be it One Eleven related or not!
- Reception + Housekeeping + Butlers who served us our meals: 
Everyone of them is amazingly thoughtful and helpful! 
e.g: Smple gesture of removing my robe from the chair while I pose to take photo (knowing that the robe will spoil the picture).// Informing the driver of our local tour (doesn't belong to One Eleven) about my food allergies. // Sending a driver to pick us up when we got lost somewhere near the villa etc etc etc

3) The Value

The price at first glance is rather steep. But given the quality of the "hardware", service, food and spa, it's definitely worth right down to the cent.

text:
I was lost for words when we reach our room..it was so huge with modern design, what can I say when all have been said by other people. You have to experience it yourself. Look no further if you are coming to Bali. You must stay in One Eleven even if is just for 1 night. It's worth every penny(FYI I stay for 3 night). As a Muslim I am very conscious about food as majority of the food is not Halal in Bali, but I was assured from the staff that all the meat are Halal and it made a great stay for me.On the first day I inform the staff that the room was not cold enough, may be the room was huge and the air con could not make it cold. the next day they brought me a standing fan, what a great service and we had a great night sleep.
The only downside to me is the Spa. You could not have your Spa in the morning or midday as it is to hot in the spa room due to the glass roof, I understand that they want natural light in, but if the room is to hot it not wort it, maybe they should change it to a normal roof so that people can have the spa anytime of the day not just in the evening or night.
The other problem i had with the spa is the masseuse..we had a complimentry 2 hr massage, the person who massage me did a good jod for the first 45min and when she thinks that i am sleeping she just keep touching my foot and when I make her known that I am not sleeping she will do a proper massage, but she still did the same thing again when she think i am sleeping I just gave up and let her be.That is the only downside for me but for the rest of the stay is was great from the front office staff to the service staff every one was top of their service. O ya I forgot to mention that they provided a free pick for me from another hotel and after that they even send me to my next destination as I was hopping around Bali...a few days here a few days there...thank you one eleven for the great service.

PS:- I book direct to one eleven and they gave a great price + 2hrs free massage for 2 + dinner or lunch for 2. It's better to book direct then going thru any agency.

text:
One Eleven is really a little slice of heaven in the middle of Seminyak. On arrival, I was escorted straight to my villa and check-in was processed in the sitting area. A welcome drink was presented and I was also treated to a foot bath. 

The villa is quite big, with a separate spa pavilion right next to the rather big swimming pool. The spa pavilion does get very warm in the day though and the air conditioning in it is not up to the task of keeping the room cool. I ended up doing my massage with the windows open. The pool is great for doing a quick lap and the water didn't give off a strong chlorine smell that you'd get with most other swimming pools. In fact, I almost believed that it was a fresh water pool.  

The sitting area is open air and can get rather warm but the fan does a decent job of keeping it cool enough. The kitchen is a welcome addition, as it allowed me to cook up a light supper. The bedroom area has a very spacious wardrobe and comes with a very modern entertainment system, hugh Sony LED TV and a Blu-ray player to boot. I was quite impressed by that as not many hotels, even the most high end ones, provide Blu-ray players in the rooms. The air conditioning was cooling enough but would have been better if it was stronger. The wi-fi, although complimentary, was rather weak and at times very difficult to get a connection to even load a webpage. One also has to be careful with the reading lights as they hang rather low from the ceiling and can be a hazard to taller people when getting on/off the bed. The master light switch is also a bit of a stretch when lying in bed. 

The bathroom is very spacious and comes with his/her toiletries, including a full range of separate soaps/shampoos catering to both male and female users. The tub is pretty big although it isn't the most comfortable to rest in, as there is headrest. The rain shower was adequate to the task although it might have been better to have a conventional shower head installed as well. Water pressure was a tad weak and the temperature inconsistent at times. Some of the towels did have little stains on them but overall it was negligible. 

The best thing about One Eleven is the service. The staff never failed to greet me by name and were always very accommodating with my little requests. There is a shuttle service around Seminyak available to the hotel guests and it was easily available throughout the day. The daily breakfast prepared in my villa was quite a treat. I was recommended a lovely Italian restaurant called Ultimo, just a 5-10 walk from One Eleven, and it proved to be a great place for dinner. The prices were very reasonable and the food of good quality. The housekeeping team changed the towels each time after I left the property and that really made me feel that the management wanted guests to feel like their every need was being cared for, one can never have too many bath towels, considering Bali's weather.

Overall I'd happily recommend One Eleven to anyone visiting Bali and I do hope that many other people will get the chance to experience their charms.

text:
After reading many of the positive reviews (as they should be!), there's certainly not a whole lot to add other than sharing the personal experience my wife and I enjoyed during our stay at One Eleven.

After a shaky start to our annual vacation at a sister resort, we were fortunate enough to be whisked away to One Eleven. First off, I have to congratulate the manager of both resorts, David Beevers (I know you'll be reading this), for going out of his way to make our stay as memorable as possible and making us negate the start of our trip.

One cannot help but go "Wow..." when walking into the villa. If you think you have an expectation of how it's going to be by looking at the photos, you will be blown away in reality. The decor and architecture is modern and beautiful. The colours used throughout the villa is vibrant and the whole feel of the place simply puts one into "relaxation mode". The pool is huge and absolutely divine. The bedroom is spacious with a tonne of cupboard space and an ultra comfortable bed. The bathroom doesn't leave much behind and it has one of the best showers I've ever experienced in my life!

Breakfast gets prepared in your villa by a little army of staff every morning - the food and present menu choices are great. Everything else throughout the day is only a phone call away and usually gets done within minutes. On that note: the staff at One Eleven is exceptional. It's not your average Joe Bloe staff generally found in some Bali resorts - of the conversations we enjoyed with some of the staff members revealed their previous experience in the hospitality industry in parts such as Europe and the US. And they leave no stone unturned. My wife felt sick during our first couple of nights (head cold), and upon asking the staff for directions to the nearest pharmacy, our butler asked what exactly it is we were after. After providing the detail on some meds, he returned half an hour later with the tablets - totally unexpected!

Another major plus mentioned here was access to a hotel driver. Yes, friendly gentlemen are available to drive you around locally when needed. This is a massive perk, and I'd like to thank David and his drivers for providing this service to their guests.

The whole experience is personalised, and it's the small things that really captivated us. They noticed that stack of novels next to the bed; the next day we found little bookmarks inserted where we last left off! The staff also noticed that we drink a lot of water, and so every night while preparing our room, bottled water and a glass would be placed next to the bed. Things get done without having to ask. You don't get to experience that in many places these days.

We're a very private couple, and we go to Bali to relax, recharge, and enjoy some peace and quiet. That's exactly what you can expect at One Eleven. The resort is superbly private and extremely quiet - it's as if the wider audience enjoying their stay at the resort have the same frame of mind as us! If that is the sort of break you're looking for as a couple, I cannot recommend this resort highly enough.

This place is a hidden gem and this experience has been one of our best getaways yet. The best we've had in Bali. Definitely expect us again next year One Eleven!

text:
My wife and I spent 4 nights here during our first trip to Bali. We were also celebrating our 10th wedding anniversary. When we arrived, we were greeted by a small army of staff, including the manager I believe, and then whisked to our villa in a golf buggy. When we stepped in, we went "WOW". The villa itself is stunning, and we were even more awed when we stepped into the room to discover the bed decorated with flower petals spelling out "I love you" along with a heart shaped cake waiting for us. We were awed. We also had a cold drink waiting for us, and a foot scrub as well! Nice!

The villa has good amenities such as a Yamaha ISX800, Sony Bravia, Eubiq power strips, Krups coffee machine, and the list goes on. Everything is very new and clean - well it is just about 5 months old. The pool is lovely and one can pretty much do a proper lap in it, unlike other villas I have encountered with smaller pools. There is a spa gazebo within the villa grounds, so you don't need to wander off far at all to enjoy a massage. 

We looked forward to breakfast prepared in the villa every morning, with a menu presented the night before for us to make our selection. During the day, we received ice lollies - pretty much frozen fruit juice, a welcome treat when it's so hot and humid. Do check out the sushi bar Shiro as well, tucked away in a corner with intricate woodwork and sashimi that was fresh and well portioned. I enjoyed the unagi kabayaki, and also found the chawanmushi delightful with a little orange peel in it. Chef Shiro-san saw us out after our dinner as well and presented his card to us. Excellent food and service. Do try.

Service was always just a call away and a buggy will appear to whisk you away, along with a driver that is available to drop you off anywhere within Seminyak and fetch you back as well. 

So what's there not to like? We had mozzies bothering us each night, despite weekly fogging and repellents in the room. We felt our room wasn't cold enough and despite our feedback, we don't think much was done as it pretty much felt the same. We also felt that the dining area was too warm and on one hot night we were perspiring as we dined. 

But there isn't too much to complain about. One Eleven is an awesome choice amongst the many many options in Bali, especially more so now with the soft launch discount.

Architecture is not all I will remember about One Eleven. Its the service and people who create the place. It is in its opening stage now, some of the things yet "to be polished", but overall I think its fantastic. Spa room treatments, poolside cocktails, freebies like mosquito repellant every night and a lot of attention from the staff shows that management do really care about their guests. On my next trip to Bali, I will not look for any other place than One Eleven. Just afraid the price might go really up once they passed the opening stage operation....

text: I have found the diamond in Bali - One Eleven. It is literally a genuine gem in the middle of Seminyak. We must be the first people to stay there. It's been open for a few days only before our arrival. Our original booking was at a different hotel, from which we checked out after the second night after a bad experience. One Eleven is truly boutique property with very limited villas, if not mistaken 11 villas only. It might be small in total number of units, but big inside. The space is just unbelievable. Swimming pool is big enough that you can really swim in it. TV in bedroom, another TV in the living room, private spa pavilion, bathroom with bathtub and shower, outdoor shower, over sized sofa and dining table for a party of 6 are almost over the top! This is a 1-bedroom villa I am talking about. Service itself was excellent, staff would do anything at anytime to make sure you get what you asked for. I also haven't had spa treatments in my own pavilion before. It was just top-notch. And the best part is, there is no name to this hotel from outside!!! You won't see any big signage, only a little logo which doesn't say much but step inside and wow!
title: "A diamond in Seminyak"

text:
It was only by chance that we came to know of One Eleven. We were staying at another hotel and had to pass this amazing looking building with wood panels on our way to the restaurants and shops along Eat Street. It was nothing like the buildings in Bali and with a nondescript sign, curiosity got hold of us and we walked in to ask. We were given a tour of the villa and were bowled over with what we saw that we jumped ship :)

First thing that amazed us was the vertical garden along the walkway from the lobby to villa. Walking along that garden everyday on our way in/out was somewhat very calming. And when we stepped into our villa, we immediately fell in love with the spaciousness and style. Such clean lines.

I personally like to laze around after a massage and maybe snooze a little more. Having our own spa pavilion allowed me to do so. (At most of the spa places I have been to, the therapists would knock at the door to rush you out almost immediately after treatment so they can take another guest!). You have to try the Four Hands Massage - a pair of hands rubbing away all the tight knots, now imagine 2 pair of hands working on you - HEAVEN!

What they didn't advertise is the Daily Surprise that they dole out. During our stay, we found home made ice lollies in the freezer. After a hot and sunny day at the beach, this was a nice gesture. On another day, they served us strawberries dipped in chocolate. Very sexy, you know what I mean.

We don't need to go into the obvious details (whatever is in their ads, it's true!). For us, it's the little things that count. And these little things will make us come back to One Eleven again.
title: Everything little thing...

owner_response.text:
Great to hear that you liked the little things about your stay at One Eleven. The expression that " it is the little things that make the difference " holds true and we are certainly trying to deliver on that promise. We are not perfect yet and will continue to try to improve to provide the services expected by all our guests.
With regards
David

text:
11月の中旬にソロ旅で4泊しました。
アプローチから大きなプライベートプール、オープンリビングにベットルームにバスルームのアメニティに至るまでどこを撮っても絵になるプロダクト。
素敵なヴィラでした。

・プール
泳げる大きさ。循環していていつも清潔な状態です。

・オープンリビング
蚊は気にならない程度。
が、大きなソファーでお昼寝するのは本当に気持ちよかったです。
夜はヤモリと出会います。

・ベッドルーム
1壁全面の収納が大きく便利。
アイロン＆アイロン台がついています。
テレビとDVDはSONY。

・バスルーム
シャワー水圧は問題なし。ただしレインのみ。
アメニティはハンドソープ（固形）、シャンプー、コンディショナー、ボディソープ、ボディクリーム、サンブロックが、男女別に。
また、虫よけスプレーがいい香りで、外出時にも持ち歩いていました。
バスタブは、寝転がれるサイズ。ためるにはそこそこ時間がかかります。
バスソルトあり。

・その他
少し離れたスーパーまで車を出してくれ、助かりました。
ターンダウンの際、あわせてリビングに蚊取り線香を置いてくれます。
朝食は、お部屋で仕上げてくれ、おいしく温かい食事がとれます。
お昼ご飯はいらないくらいのボリュームでした。
フレッシュなジュースやカフェラテ等、リクエストにもこたえてくれます。

何より感動したのが、お部屋についているバレで受けるマッサージ。
今まで受けたバリニーズマッサージの中で、最も上手でした。
あのマッサージを受けることを目的に再訪したいほど最高でした。

以前から泊まってみたいヴィラでハネムーンにぴったりの仕様だったので、一人で利用するのは、なかなか気がひけましたが、行ってよかったです！

一点だけ。。。
ドライヤーが微妙でした。他の何をとってもブランディングされてたので、余計に目につきました。
title: 充分なサイズのプール。シンプルで洗練されたプロダクト。

owner_response.text:
この度は星の数ほどあるバリ島のヴィラ、ホテルから私たちワンイレブンをお選び頂き心より感謝申し上げます。

頂いたコメントを拝見させて頂きましたがどれも嬉しいコメントばかりで自信になるばかりか今後も今以上にヴィラのサービスの質を改善していかなければと肝に銘じた次第です。

ドライヤー？まさにご指摘通りでございます。貴重なご意見ありがとうございます。またいつかバリでお会いできることスタッフ一同心よりお待ちしています。

ありがとうございました。

text: 优点：完美的服务，完美的room，完美的privacy，低调奢华，酒店就是景点。如果你是来旅游的，定了这个房间，空出两天专门在这个套间里度过两天，绝对比出去玩性价比更高。游泳，晒太阳，spa，小憩，早餐，午茶，听音乐，躺着，坐着，趴着，蹲着，都是极好的。呼吸都是甜的。缺点：蚊子有点多，记得关门，酒店帮你点了蚊香，提供了驱蚊水，但蚊子还是有。毕竟面前一片草地。最大的缺点，你们家这么高大上这么完美的酒店，门牌是不是太小了一点了，找都找不到。门牌是I II，简约的都不能再简约了，但服务却一点都不简约，好的不行。总体来说，酒店是完美的，可以作为一个景点来体验，美中不足的地方是可以忽略的，第一次去让司机一定要看仔细了，酒店门牌在一堆草里面：I II。就是酒店门牌，晚上去会发光，白天去，自己看着办吧，大不了问一下路人（我们问了路人，在酒店门口来回开了很久，最后司机灵光一现发现了酒店）。nice，perfect！！

text:
В целом очень хороший отель. Спокойный, большая вилла, хороший бассейн, приветливый персонал. 
Есть бесплатные транспортные услуги, что было нам очень удобно.
Завтрак готовят каждое утро на открытой кухне и сервируют, очень приятно. Завтрак был достаточно вкусный, каждый день меню менялось.
Мы заказали один раз барбекю, готовили при нас, было вкусно. 
Для отеля такого уровня, как они себя позиционируют, им не хватает сообразительности и внимания к деталям. Мы каждый день просили цельнозерновой хлеб и йогурт без сахара. Они принесли 2 раза, 3 раза забыли или не поняли. В общем, если есть 1 раз пожелание, то нужно его автоматически соблюдать, чтобы не нужно было каждый раз просить. 
Уборка - не хватает внимания к деталям. То есть все что будет лежать в ванной (баночки, косметика), так и останутся не тронутыми. Пару раз забыли на turn down забрать грязные полотенца и положить новые, убрать грязную посуду из раковины, в там муравьи. 1 раз не дали turn down complimentary угощение. В принципе не страшно, так как они были не вкусные, но просто остаётся ощущение не внимательности, видимо очень спешили.
В общем твёрдая 4, я рекомендую.
title: Несколько небольших минусов, но в целом отлично

text: 走的是現代風路線，所有的佈置及裝潢都很明亮，空間有很大，泳池更是我在峇里島看過最大的長池。villa內有私人按摩室，不用走出villa即可享受私人按摩。服務人員都很有禮貌。每天早、晚餐菜單都不同，且是到villa內煮及食用，由於沒有抽油煙機的設施，若點煎炸類，會薰的一身油煙味。房間內隔間木板施做較差，拉推都有些費力。洗手間內設施完善且好用，毛巾乾淨且針織密度夠，使用很舒服。惟位居較裡面，走到熱鬧的街上需一點時間。若不想離開villa，對面有一間燒烤餐廳和酒吧，步行2分鐘內即有變利商店。有免費專車預約接送在水明漾區域內。聽說二樓的日本餐廳不錯。但沒時間去試。

text:
Es gibt nicht viel zum One Eleven zu sagen - einfach nur traumhaft schön!

Die Villen sind wirklich sehr großzügig und das Design sehr stimmig. Die Ausstattung ist perfekt.

Der Pool ist genial - bei der Größe kann manch Schulschwimmbad nicht mithalten;-). Nicht nur die Größe ist super, auch die Abtrennung in Schwimmbereich und Chillbereich.

Auch der Service lässt keine Wünsche offen. Das Frühstück bestellt man am Abend mit Angabe der Uhrzeit vor und es wird dann live in der villaeigenen Küche zubereitet. Es hat immer alles genial geschmeckt !Auch kleine Änderungen waren immer problemlos möglich.
Ebenso ließ auch die Maxibar keine Wünsche offen - es war wirklich alles an Getränken und Knabbereien da, was einem nur in den Kopf kommt.
Das Personal war äußerst freundlich und hat uns jeden Wunsch erfüllt.

Es gäbe noch sooo viel tolles zu berichten, aber das würde den Rahmen sprengen.
Einfach hinfahren und genießen!
title: Traumhaft schön...

owner_response.text:
Herzlichen Dank für Ihre Bewertung.
Wir sind sehr erfreut, dass sie Ihren Aufenthalt bei uns genossen haben.
Zudem ist es ist besonders schön zu hören, dass die Villen, der Pool, unser Service und das Frühstück zu Ihrer vollsten Zufriedenheit war.
Es war uns eine Ehre Sie bei OneEleven begrüßen zu dürfen und wir würden uns über ein Wiedersehen freuen.
 
Mit freundlichen Grüßen
Emma Neubronner

text:
Buena atencion, maravillosa villa con decoracion moderna,situada cerca de todos los restaurantes y bares de la zona.
Seminyak es bastante feo, pero la villa es espectacular, cuidada al detalle con todos los servicios disponibles.
Piscina grande y cuidada.
Room revice delicioso y excelente precio.
Los masajes mejor fuera del hotel, mas baratos.. Sin comparacion..
Servicio de coche gratuito.
El desayuno te lo preparan cada mañana en la villa, muy rico! Lo recomiendo!
title: Preciosa villa en Seminyak

text:
je ne suis resté que 3 nuits dans cet hôtel avant mon retour sur Paris . c est mon 20 eme séjour sur Bali et ce fut 3 jours de " bien être " . les villas sont très belles , calmes , décoration simple mais de très bon gout . le personnel est d une disponibilité incroyable. 
des voitures disponibles gratuitement ou en bord de mer ou en shopping … toujours avec le sourire . 
il y a de plus en plus d hôtels sur seminyak … le one eleven est en plus très bie placé et sans bruit et construction autour de l hôtel .
très belle chambre , literie , salle de bain , produits de bain … 
tres bons petits déjeuners 
et perfection pour l équipe .
je reviendrais vite
title: perfection

text:
Eigentlich ist diese Traumvilla nicht in Worte zu fassen.
Die Bilder versprechen schon sehr viel, aber vor Ort zu sein ist es nochmal schöner.
Wir hatten neben diesem Traumhaus auch noch ein 3 Gänge Menü und 2 x 2 Std. Massagen inklusive, was wir vorher nicht wussten. 
Das Frühstück wurde immer einen Tag vorher ausgewählt und am nächsten Tag zubereitet. 
Die Buttler waren über freundlich und haben aber auch verstanden, wann keine Hilfe benötigt wurde. Das Team an der Rezeption begrüsste uns immer sehr freundlich und war auch sehr zuvorkommend. 
Sollte ich jemals wieder nach Seminyak reisen, dann werde ich wieder hierher kommen. Ein kleines Stück Paradies!
title: Unbeschreiblich schön! Ein tolles Erlebnis!

owner_response.text:

Wir freuen uns, dass Sie Ihren Aufenthalt bei uns so genossen haben und danken Ihnen für Ihre Kommentare bezüglich des Services und der Gastfreundschaft von unserem One Eleven Team. 
Darüber hinaus sind wir sind sehr froh, dass die Umgebung der Villa Ihren Wünschen & Ansprüchen entsprochen hat.

Wir freuen uns auf Ihren nächsten Besuch im One Eleven Resort und hoffen, Sie bald wieder bei uns begrüßen zu dürfen.

text:
Bali es la isla de los Dioses, un lugar que nos acerca mucho al paraíso en la tierra, por sus paisajes, por su gente, por sus playas, por su historia ... y sin duda, One Eleven es el lugar que los dioses en Bali elegirían para su descanso.

Nada más salir por la puerta de One Eleven, ya queríamos volver!, un lugar limpio, amplio, grande, relajante, lujoso, acogedor y que tiene todo lo que alguien puede desear para tener unas vacaciones perfectas.

La experiencia en ONE ELEVEN empieza en el propio aeropuerto, donde entre tanto bullicio hay una persona uniformada con un cartel muy bien preparado con nuestros nombres, ... de ahí a un coche enorme donde pone "one eleven" ... es cuando te das cuenta de que todo va a ser perfecto ... 

Hay 9 villas de lujo con unos 250 metros cuadrados muy bien aprovechados, donde hay una sala exclusiva de masajes con vistas a la piscina, y donde con tan sólo llamar a recepción, tenemos la mejor carta de masajes que alguien podría desear.

Cada Room Service se convierte en una experiencia, siempre con un servicio agradable, dispuesto a que te sientas en el paraíso y donde nunca falta la sonrisa de todas las personas que trabajan en éstas villas de Lujo. Además del service Room, hay un servicio varias veces al día que limpia y recoge la villa, prepara el incienso para la noche, nos deja una tarta cada tarde a las 6pm y se preocupan porque todo esté perfecto.

La villa tiene todo lo que podemos necesitar, un Maxi Bar donde no falta de nada, los mejores cócteles (que te preparan allí mismo) y un baño de ensueño donde cada uno tenemos multitud de cosas específicamente creados para EL y para ELLA, donde para el hombre prevalecen el Tomate+Basil, y para la mujer el Lemongrass+vanilla+coco ... crema solar de vainilla y coco, aftersun de pepino y aloe, gel de duca, champú, acondicionador, crema corporal, jabón de diferentes olores ... hay una caja repleta de cosas en el baño!.

Además de la ducha interior, hay otra ducha Balinesa fuera, junto a la sala de masajes en la que da gusto ducharse viendo la piscina, ... la villa ... los pájaros que viven en las palmeras! ... increíble.

Cada día se elige el desayuno del día siguiente y la hora, desayuno que te preparan en la propia villa en el momento y que hace que levantarse cada día sea el mejor despertar del mundo, compartiendo sonrisas, ideas para disfrutar de Bali y cualquier cosa que necesites.

A pesar de que Bali es famoso por los mosquitos, las villas se fumigan constantemente, se preparan inciensos especiales para mosquitos y además hay repelente en el neceser del baño que nos ayuda a que no tengamos ningún problema.

La situación de las villa es perfecta, muy cerca de la calle principal de Seminyak, donde hay multitud de tiendas, comercios y restaurantes, muy cerca de la playa donde el paseo es agradable (y donde hay un servicio privado y gratuito de transporte desde la villa). Además One Eleven tiene su propio restaurante japonés en el interior y sin duda, uno de los mejores que he probado en el mundo: Shiro es un restaurante japonés muy vanguardista que ofrece una calidad sin precedentes, nosotros lo disfrutamos al máximo y quedamos impresionados.

Cada villa cuenta con wifi de alta velocidad e independiente, televisión vía satélite con una televisión enorme, un reproductor de música donde se puede enganchar el iPod, iPhone, Cd's y cualquier otro aparato reproductor.

Estamos deseando volver a Bali y a One Eleven, además nos comentó el propietario que van a abrir más resort one eleven por el mundo, ESTAMOS DESEANDO VOLVER AL PARAISO, VOLVER A ONE ELEVEN.
title: Si existe el cielo, One Eleven es donde descansan los dioses

text: One Eleven 是個只有9間獨立小別墅組成的成人“酒店”，從網頁就可以察覺它的獨特高尚的品味，抱著極大的期待光臨。一登入門，眼前所看見的是比網頁上更為寬大的私人空間，除了泳池意外還有私人的按摩室，然後兩位按摩女郎上門，在這龐大的按摩室裡，為我們做迎賓洗足服務。按摩以後還送上了一杯冰凍鮮奇異果汁才退下。別墅內幾乎提供了你能想到的東西（音響，廚具，分為男女的沐浴乳的系列，每天供應水果，旁晚提供甜點，報章雜誌...），有些我們想不到的都提供了，兩手空空就可以出發。每一位服務員都非常禮貌體貼，而且還有專車乘搭，和機場接送。每一部分都可見細心之處，讓你感覺像家一般舒服自在！
title: 完美的豪華度假別墅

text:
7月2日より直販予約にて3泊してきました。　出発前のメールにも迅速丁寧に対応して頂き、また私たちが気付かないところまで気を配って頂ける内容で安心して出発する事が出来ました。

まずヴィラはミニマムなデザインながら機能的にデザインされており、特筆なのはプールの大きさ。　ワンベットルームだとディピングプールが多いなか、111のプールは充分に泳げる広さがありました。
ヴィラ内の清掃もプールを含め行き届いており快適なステイが出来ました。

スタッフに関してもいつも笑顔で優しく接して頂き、仕事をテキパキとこなす姿が印象的でした。　サービスも南国風の大雑把な物ではなく、各個人にあったきめ細かいサービスを提供してくれるヴィラでハード、ソフト共に素晴らしく夢のような4日間を過ごす事が出来ました。
title: 素晴らしいの一言！

text:
Het was echt het einde.
We moesten ons zelf verplichten om eens uit onze villa te komen en Bali te gaan bezoeken.
De service en vriendelijkheid was gewoon subliem!
We komen zeker terug en nog meer dan 1 keer!
Hier kunnen we echt niets slechts van vertellen.
Het was leuk daar wij wel graag eens aan naturisme doen.
We waren gewoon constant in ons blootje en niemand die je daar ziet. Zelfs het huispersoneel dat af en toe kwam koken, poetsen en massage geven stoorde zich niet aan ons.
Een paradijs in een lounge sfeertje. Zaaaaalig!
title: Ongeloofelijk !!!!!!!!!!!!!

text:
أعجبني أنا وزوجتي هذا الفندق وطرازه العصري الحديث،
يقدمون الإفطار يوميا ويعدونه في منزلك وأنت تشاهد
استقبلونا استقبال جيد وقدموا لنا عشاء مجاملة شهي لكنه كان قليلا بعض الشيء :)، وفاجؤنا بكيكة شهر العسل
الحمامات مجهزة مثل الحمامات الشرق أوسطيه، حيث تحتوي على شطاف ، وهذا جيد لأن معظم فنادق بالي حماماتها بدون شطاف

يوجد تلفزيونين شارب يبثان القنوات المحلية
غرفة المساج الخاصة بك يمكنك استعمالها أو طلب عاملات لعمل المساج بكل خصوصية داخل الفيلا - وقد أهدونا ساعتين مجانا 

لم يعجبني ارتفاع سعر الفيلا نوعا ما عن باقي فنادق بالي، لكن الفلل في منطقة سيمنياك معظمها مرتفعة السعر، حتى أن اسعار الأشياء المحلية مرتفع، فلا أنصح بالتسوق في سيمنياك

بصفة عامة هذا الفندق يستحق الزيارة، والعاملون فيه ودودين جدا، ومهنيون، ومثقفون ، أحدهم كان يعمل في دبي :)
title: مكان راقي في منطقة راقية

text:
初のビラ滞在でした。
一番素晴らしかったのはその施設と広さ！！！
友人からはバリのプール付きビラはついていてもすごく小さいものが多いと言われていましたが、二人での滞在には十分な広さでした。

お庭も十分広く、夜にはカエルが、朝には鳥がやってきて、ゆっくりと一緒にときをすごせました。

また朝食は、わたしが頼んだマフィンは本当に美味しかった。

不満をいえば、日本後をしゃべれるスタッフがいると言っていたが、一度も出会わなかった。
話題のロックバー(アヤナの中だったかな？)に行きたいと言って、予約がとれたと言われたので、そちらに行ったら、予約は取れないといわれ、サンセットを見に行ったにもかかわらず、サンセット後までバーに入れなかったこと。
予約が取れないならそう言ってくれれば、スミニャックのカフェでのんびりしたのに。と
あと、植物が少し枯れているところがあって、手入れが完璧に行き届いているわけではなかった。

でも総合的にもう一度滞在したいホテルです。
title: ビラは最高。。スタッフはやっぱりバリ人かな。

text:
Tijdens onze honeymoon trip hebben we onszelf een dagje getrakteerd op One
Eleven en we hebben genoten! 

De villa's zijn adembenemend mooi,
splinternieuw en voorzien van alle mogelijke luxe (echt donzen dekbed, iPod music centre, 2tv's, OPEN leefruimte en keuken). Het zwembad is zalig groot en in de tuin is er altijd een plekje in de zon of schaduw te vinden. 

Bediening fantastisch: ontbijt werd in onze keuken klaargemaakt, hadden een eigen butler. 

Als je daar verblijft dan heb je niet de behoefte om buiten te gaan dus hebben wij 22u genoten van ons eigen stukje paradijs. Heerlijk!
title: Nooit geziene luxe verblijf!

owner_response.text:
Het hele team van One Eleven wilt u feliciteren met uw recente huwelijk en we waren zo blij om te kunnen bijdragen aan uw huwelijksreis ervaring. Het was ons een genoegen om u beiden te hebben tijdens uw  verblijf bij ons en om One Eleven te hebben gekozen om uw zeer speciale dag te vieren. We hopen dat u metter tijd terug keerd naar One Eleven om uw vele bruiloft verjaardagen te komen vieren vieren.
I hope my Dutch is sufficently good enough. 
Best regards
David
